title: please change urf back
body: ive playes a AR urf which enermy team is so strong i and my team juat cant do anything...

replies.body: That's what rerolls are for; to avoid getting weak champs in URF. You should get one every two games or so.
why cant we juat get to play who we want instead of getting more champs you dony like, whatever im playing normal
